where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
